---
title: "IP ACLs"
editor: visual
code-block-bg: dark
---

**IP access-list**: Defines traffic - either via permit/deny

**IP Access-group**: applies an ACL to a physical `interface`

-   `ip access-group <ACL name> {in|out}`
-   `ipv6 traffic-filter <ACL name> {in|out}`

**Access-class**: applies an ACL to a `line` (VTY, Console, Aux) etc.

``` default
line con 0
 access-class <acl name>
```
